text:
eero (https://eero.com) | San Francisco, CA | Full-time | ONSITE

We're looking for backend, data, mobile, firmware, and hardware engineers. We are also looking to hire senior PMs and designers. Our mission is to be the gold standard in Wi-Fi and to become the backbone for your smart home. Our stack includes Scala, Akka, C, Python, React, Swift, Java.

Apply at https://boards.greenhouse.io/eero or email me at yahui.jin@eero.com.
